author: chunqingchen
body: I've tested it on Linux and Windows. Joey is still confirming the copyright info of the branding. Sending out the code review first, waiting for the final confirm of the branding.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
By looking at the CI failures it seems that your baseline code is very-very old.
Please [rebase](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/powershell-repository-101.md#sync-your-local-repo).

Also, please, don't remove PR template, when you create PRs and use it as a checklist instead.

title: Remove Windows branding #1033
